answer_1: You can sign up through our website, by calling or writing to WhatsApp/Instagram.
answer_2: We accept payment in cash and bank cards.
answer_3: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time.
answer_4: Yes, some procedures have medical contraindications. Please consult with our specialist before recording.
answer_5: The procedure time depends on the service chosen. Usually from 30 minutes to 3 hours.
answer_6: Some procedures require special preparation. The specialist will inform you about this when registering.

cta.description: Contact us and we will be happy to answer all your questions
cta.title: Didn't find the answer to your question?

question_1: How to sign up for the procedure?
question_2: What payment methods do you accept?
question_3: Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?
question_4: Do you have any contraindications to the procedures?
question_5: How long does the procedure take?
question_6: Is preliminary preparation necessary for the procedure?

booking.answer: You can sign up for the procedure through the form on our website{{phone, phone}}, by calling {{phone}}{{/phone}}{{instagram, instagram}}, or by writing to us on Instagram {{instagram}}{{/instagram}}. We will contact you to confirm your appointment.
booking.question: How to sign up for the procedure?

cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment up to 24 hours before your scheduled time. If canceled less than 24 hours in advance, a penalty of 50% of the cost of the service may be charged.
cancellation.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?

certificates.answer: Yes, all our masters have international certificates and regularly take advanced training courses.
certificates.question: Do your craftsmen have certificates?

contraindications.answer: Yes, each procedure has its own contraindications. Main: pregnancy, lactation, acute inflammatory processes, blood diseases, oncology. Before the procedure, consultation with a specialist is required.
contraindications.question: Are there any contraindications to the procedures?

gift.answer: Yes, we offer gift certificates for any amount or for specific services. Contact us to obtain a certificate.
gift.question: Can I give a certificate for services?

guarantee.answer: Yes, we guarantee the quality of all our services. If you are not satisfied with the result, contact us within 7 days and we will find a solution.
guarantee.question: Do you provide a guarantee for services?

location.answer: We are located at: {{address}}. Detailed information on how to get there can be found on the Contacts page.
location.question: Where is your salon located?

loyalty.answer: Yes, we have a cumulative loyalty program. After each visit you receive bonuses that can be used to pay for future visits.
loyalty.question: Do you have a loyalty program?

materials.answer: We use only certified premium materials from the world's leading brands. All pigments are hypoallergenic and safe for health.
materials.question: What materials do you use?

payment.answer: We accept payment in cash and cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express). Payment is made after the service is provided.
payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?

preparation.answer: Yes, some procedures require preparation. We provide detailed recommendations upon registration.
preparation.question: Is preparation necessary before the procedure?

weekends.answer: Yes, we work 7 days a week. {{weekdays, weekdays}}On weekdays {{weekdays}}{{/weekdays}}{{weekends, weekends}}, on weekends {{weekends}}{{/weekends}}.
weekends.question: Do you work on weekends?

subtitle: Answers to popular questions about our services
title: Frequently Asked Questions
